education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Computer Engineering and Computer Science

items: Optimized model backtesting codebase written in R, decreasing runtime by 34%. Added 540 unit tests and fixed existing broken tests in legacy test suite.
Rewrote Perl, Python, and R scripts in Go, yielding upwards of an 18x+ reduction in runtime.
Rewrote and maintained a regression testing program in Golang. Implemented QoL features and CLI using Charmâ€™s Huh library. Decreased runtime by 10% and reduced dependency on Perl, Python, and R.
Fulfilled and expanded on feature requests. Integrated daily metrics, target template, and account tracking for internal client tracker. Introduced Zulip support for easily accessible notifications.
Fulfilled ticket requests from clients and senior developers.

Crafted 14 client-facing slide decks reflecting ROAS, Audience Segmentation, Long-term Impact, and other internal metrics for 11 clients of the Amazon Grocery team using PostgreSQL queries and Python notebooks.
Created 5 1P & 3P insights with 104 views and 19 downloads for the IMDb team. 1P data collected using PostgreSQL queries and Tableau. 3P data collected from GWI and MRI-Simmons.
Maintained internal web application tracking project status built using Python and Streamlit.
Created and documented an internal query analysis web application built using Python, Streamlit, Vega-Altair, and pandas.
Fulfilled insight ticket requests from Ad Media Managers and Sales.
Updated SCRUM project statuses and milestones hosted on Salesforce

projects.name: Kino
items: Designed and implemented the PostgreSQL database for storing movie and user data
Automated data aggregation and storage of publicly available data using Python.
